features: ❤ NATURAL AND ORGANIC VEGAN FACE WASH FOR KIDS - 99% Natural and over 80% organic and we have eliminated ingredients of concern from our kids face wash.
❤ SOOTHING KIDS FACE CARE: No artificial fragrance/parfum and packed with organic Aloe Vera to soothe, calm and rejuvenate.

❤ CLEANSES and EXFOLIATES: Boasts natural cleansing ingredients enriched with Papaya extract an excellent natural astringent which reduces excess oils, gently cleanses and exfoliates the skin leaving a clean, smooth, even-toned skin.
❤ SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Formulated without harsh ingredients making it perfect for all types of skin including sensitive, combination, oily, dry and normal.
❤ LOVED BY PARENTS: We take great pride in providing parents with a clean and effective cleanser for their children and we are sure you’ll love it's nourishing and cleansing benefits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Daughter’s Favorite Foaming Wash!
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the Foaming Face Wash and it’s been a delightful addition to our family’s daily routine. Its gentle, foamy texture not only cleanses effectively but also adds a touch of playfulness that my kids love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Kid’s Face Wash!
reviews.reviewText: A gentle face wash perfect for sensitive skin. My son loves getting to wash his face at night and I love its very light citrus scent!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good on kids skin
reviews.reviewText: Loved it on all the kids skin smelled great too

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for my tween
reviews.reviewText: Gentle for my tween girl skin. Great to help her get into the habit of washing her face pre puberty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No scent face wash foam
reviews.reviewText: Helps cleanse your face. The whole family can use it. No scent and is great for giving your face a nice foam cleanse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughterhas been using this since she was 9 years old. This is very gentle and doesn’t dry out her skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You’ll love this! Best face cleanser for kids sensitive skin 🤩
reviews.reviewText: The smell is so delicious (light and orangey) Perfect for children with sensitive skin. Gave my girls that “grown up” feeling to have a cleanser like mom without drying out their delicate skin. Follow with the moisturizer from same brand. Even works nicely on adult combo skin, which is a plus.Update: ordered again and packaging has improved. Used to come assembled but that caused leaks in shipping. Thank you for updating the packaging. What a difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is our first time using this product. I bought for my 3 year old daughter to teach her to wash her face (gotta start 'em early!). When we opened the package, some of the cleanser leaked out of the bottle, not sure how. The cap was off, so maybe the pump was pushed down sometime during transport. Well, because the label was wet, it was very sticky and the first time I put the bottle in my hand, the design/words on the label rubbed off (was not intentionallly rubbing off). Then the label started getting sandy since the actual label was disingrating. We finally just peeled off the whole label after only having this product for 10 minutes. This is probably more of a big deal for me since one of the reasons I was interested in this product (and my almost 4 year old daughter) is because of the label. It added a bit of fun that could have helped me keep my daughter's interest.From first use, the cleanser itself seems nice. It's gentle, has a pleasant fragrance, and we like that it foams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: my child has just turned 12 and used this face wash, leaves skin in good condition and removes dirt.
At the first time, I wash it and it getting red and itchy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Really lovely gentle face wash for everyone.
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this as a stocking filler as my 10 year old starting getting spots and wanted him to have a more grown up and full proof way for him to clean his face without soap drying it out.He loved it and uses it every time he showers. It smells nice. Feels lovely on your skin and foam is fun. I have to admit I have used it to see what it was like and now we all use it. And will be buying more when it runs out. My skin feels so incredibly soft afterwards without moisturiser and all round amazing product. I even had a couple of people comment how soft my face was as I tested some make up whilst shopping. You get what you pay for and would highly recommend. Great for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin and I was looking for something gentle without lots of chemicals. I very much like this product. Cleanse well, smells good. I understand everyone's skin is different, but worth a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my 10 year old as she's started taking an interest in my toiletries, however my facial wash was drying her skin and left her with dry patches. I've found it hard to find a product aimed at her age group but this product is packaged nicely, neither too babyish or too grown up.After 2 days of use her skin has recovered and is no longer dry, she loves the smell and having her own face wash has made her feel grown up. Would definitely recommend this
